description: This source file defines interfaces for process container management in the WPEFramework, including network interfaces, memory and CPU info, container lifecycle, and container administrator functionalities.

classes.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
classes.description: Interface for iterating network interfaces associated with a container, providing methods like Name(), NumAddresses(), and Address().

classes.name: IMemoryInfo
classes.description: Interface that provides memory usage statistics such as Allocated, Resident, and Shared memory.

classes.name: IProcessorInfo
classes.description: Interface for obtaining CPU usage details, including total usage, core-specific usage, and number of cores.

classes.name: IContainer
classes.description: Represents a container, providing methods to retrieve its ID, PID, memory, processor info, network interfaces, and control operations like Start() and Stop().

classes.name: IContainerIterator
classes.description: Interface to iterate over container instances, primarily providing access to container IDs.

classes.name: IContainerAdministrator
classes.description: Singleton interface that manages container lifecycle, including creation, retrieval, and listing all containers.

methods.name: Container
methods.description: Creates a new container instance with specified ID, search paths, log path, and configuration.

methods.name: Logging
methods.description: Enables logging for the container framework with specified global log path and options.

methods.name: Containers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all existing container instances.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a container by its ID, returning nullptr if not found.

ctags.name: IContainerIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class IContainerIterator : public Core::IIterator, public Core::IReferenceCounted {$/

ctags.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class INetworkInterfaceIterator : public Core::IIterator,  public Core::IReferenceCounted  {$/
